revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=Technologic Systems |model=TS-7800 |revision=Rev E |is_manuf=No |price=269 |est_release_date=08/2007 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=2-pin Molex |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F5182 |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=512 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Memphis |ram1_model=MEM5116D1CBTG-5 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA, PC/104 bus |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 16-pin header,, populated |serial=yes,, console port (DE-9),, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1118 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=RTC w/ NVSRAM;TI;BQ3287EAMT;;1;,,, FPGA w/ 12K LUTs;Lattice;ECP2-12;;1;,,, 5V RS232 Transceiver;Sipex;SP213E;;1;,,, 4-bit SPI Serial Flash;STMicro;M25P40;;1;,,, In-System Programmable PLD;Lattice Semi;LC4064ZC;;1;,,, 8-bit AVR Microcontroller with 8Kb Flash;Atmel;ATmega48;;1;,,, High-Performance RS232 Line Driver/Reciever;Sipex;SP202E;;1;,,, 0.8A Low Dropout Linear Regulator;National Semiconductor;LM1117;;1;,,, 1.5A Low-Voltage Current-Mode Synchronous PWM Buck Regulator;Fairchild;FAN2012;;1;,,, High-Speed CMOS 10-Bit Bus Switch w/ FLow-Through Pinout;IDT;IDTQS3861;;2;,,, 3A Peak Current Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;MVPG31;;2;,,, 100mA 30V Low-Dropout Voltage Regulator;TI;LP2951;;1;,,, Temperature Sensor w/ SPI Interface;TI;TMP124;;1;,,, Dual Inverter Gate;TI;SN74LVC2G04;;2;,,, Reset Circuit;STMicro;STM1001;;1; |flags=SD Card slot, Micro SD Card slot, ADC, RTC w/ battery, temperature sensor, UART, GPIO, FPGA }} {{TagLine|PC/104 Embedded Computer}} :[https://www.embeddedts.com/products/TS-7800 Product page] ===Documentation=== *[https://docs.embeddedts.com/TS-7800 ''Board Documentation''] *[https://github.com/embeddedTS ''Code Respository''] ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F5182 @500MHz *Storage: 512MB (NAND) Flash, :TF card (max.32GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 128MB (DDR) SDRAM *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Network: 1x 1GbE port *Power Source: 5V/1A via 2-pin molex ==Images== File:Technologic Systems TS-7800 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Technologic Systems TS-7800 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] ---- __NOTOC__
